revised_title: Phylogenetic Analysis and Classification of the Trilobite Order Lichida
tldr: This study examines the classification and phylogeny of the trilobite order Lichida, including two families: Lichidae and Lichakephalidae. The authors provide new interpretations of lichide glabellar morphology, discuss the relationships within the Lichida, and recognize 43 genera and subgenera within the five subfamilies of the Lichidae. The Lichida may be related to the Odontopleurida and have more distant affinities with the Scutelluina.
